finalRecommendation.reason: Choose a seat on the LEFT side of the aircraft. This flight offers an exceptional and prolonged sunset viewing opportunity for the majority of the journey. You will have an uninterrupted view of the sun setting as you fly west across the United States.

bestViewingPeriods.description: Golden Hour views during ascent and over the Eastern US.
A spectacular, extended sunset that progresses as the flight crosses the Midwest, the Great Plains, and the Rocky Mountains.

specialHighlights: Continuous sunset view for over half the flight.
Sun remains on the left side, no switching.
Flight path offers a chance to see the sunset transition from Golden Hour to twilight over diverse American landscapes.
